sections.purpose: To mix liquid media or reagents using a magnetic stir bar.
sections.scope: Applicable to solution preparation in Microbiology.
procedure: Place the stirrer on a level surface.
Add a clean magnetic stir bar to the container with liquid.
Place the container centrally on the stirrer platform.
Switch ON and gradually increase the stirring speed.
Adjust to obtain a stable vortex without splashing.
After mixing, reduce speed to zero and switch OFF.
Retrieve the stir bar using a magnetic retriever.
precautions: Do not operate at excessively high speeds causing decoupling.
Keep liquids away from electrical controls.
Ensure the stir bar is compatible with chemicals used.
Do not use for very viscous solutions.
